q: Where was the UN Conference on the Human Environment held in 1972?
desc: The first major conference on international environmental issues, held in Stockholm in 1972, marked a turning point in global environmental governance.

q: In which year was the Convention on Migratory Species signed?
desc: The Convention on Migratory Species was signed in Bonn in 1979 to protect migratory species across borders.

q: Where was the Convention for the Protection of the Ozone Layer held?
desc: The Vienna Convention of 1985 laid the groundwork for international efforts to protect the ozone layer.

q: Which agreement aimed to reduce substances that deplete the ozone layer?
desc: Signed in 1987, the Montreal Protocol is a landmark agreement to phase out ozone-depleting substances.

q: Which city hosted the Convention on the Transboundary Movement of Hazardous Wastes?
desc: The Basel Convention was adopted in 1989 to control the movement of hazardous waste between nations.

q: What was the focus of the 1992 Earth Summit?
desc: Held in Rio-de-Janeiro, the Earth Summit of 1992 focused on sustainable development and resulted in major environmental agreements.

q: Which city hosted the Convention on Prior Informed Consent?
desc: The Rotterdam Convention (1998) deals with the trade of hazardous chemicals and pesticides with prior informed consent.

q: Where was the UN Conference on Sustainable Development held in 2012?
desc: Rio+20, held in Rio-de-Janeiro in 2012, was the 20th anniversary of the 1992 Earth Summit.

q: Where was the Nagoya Protocol on Genetic Resources signed?
desc: The Nagoya Protocol was adopted in Nagoya, Japan, in 2010 to ensure fair sharing of genetic resources.

q: Which city hosted the CBD-CoP-11 in 2012?
desc: CBD-CoP-11 was hosted in Hyderabad, India, in 2012, focusing on biodiversity conservation.

q: Which city hosted the CoP-20 Climate Change Conference?
desc: CoP-20 was held in Lima, Peru, in 2014, as part of the annual UN climate change conferences.

q: Where was the Paris Agreement signed during CoP-21?
desc: The Paris Agreement was adopted during CoP-21 in 2015 to combat climate change.

q: Which CoP was held in Marrakeck, Morocco?
desc: CoP-22 was held in Marrakeck, Morocco in 2016, continuing the implementation of the Paris Agreement.

q: Which city hosted the Bonn Climate Conference in 2017?
desc: The CoP-23 climate conference was hosted in Bonn, Germany, in 2017 under Fiji's presidency.

q: Where was CoP-24 held?
desc: CoP-24 took place in Katowice, Poland in 2018, focusing on rulebook development for the Paris Agreement.

q: Which city hosted CoP-25 in 2019?
desc: CoP-25 was hosted in Madrid, Spain, in 2019, after being relocated from Chile.

q: Where was the CoP-26 Climate Conference held?
desc: CoP-26 took place in Glasgow, UK, in 2021 with a focus on net-zero targets and climate finance.

q: In which country was CoP-27 organized?
desc: CoP-27 was held in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt, in 2022, continuing global climate negotiations.

q: Which city is scheduled to host CoP-28?
desc: CoP-28 is scheduled to be held in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

q: Which conference marked the beginning of global environmental diplomacy?
desc: The 1972 Stockholm Conference laid the foundation for international environmental action.

q: Which convention regulates the international movement of hazardous waste?
desc: The Basel Convention (1989) controls transboundary movements of hazardous wastes.

q: Which agreement focuses on prior informed consent in hazardous chemical trade?
desc: The Rotterdam Convention (1998) ensures prior informed consent before trading hazardous chemicals.

q: Which protocol is related to access and benefit-sharing of genetic resources?
desc: The Nagoya Protocol promotes fair and equitable sharing of benefits arising from genetic resources.

q: What was a major outcome of the 2015 CoP-21 held in Paris?
desc: The Paris Agreement, adopted at CoP-21, aims to limit global warming to well below 2Â°C.

q: Which country hosted the CoP-24 in 2018?
desc: Poland hosted CoP-24 in the city of Katowice, focusing on Paris Agreement implementation guidelines.
